Description: Does the publication have the “bat” or any variation of the word in the title?
Does the publication have the “trait” or any variation of the word in the title?
The publication is kept if it is a database, review, or a study which takes its data from longitudinal studies or biological collections.
Does the publication include bat functional trait data?
Is the trait data freely accesible from the data source?
Is the trait data fully obtained from any other source already included in the literature review?
